overview:
One of the primary superangels in the Southeast, Michael serves as General Partner of CEO Ventures (www.ceoventures.com). He is generally focused on SaaS and example investments include:

  • BizCollections.com
  • BizSummits.com
  • CriticalFit.com
  • eTrain.com
  • GoPresent.com
  • ListK.com
  • LoudJob.com
  • MarketIntel.com
  • MyOpenTimes.com
  • PRWatchdog.com
  • PlugMeIn.com
  • SurveyExecutives.com
  • TeamEx.com
  • VisitorLeads.com
  • ZingFiles.com
